utter_ask_availability: Hello, We are here to put one reminder for your medicine. Please let me know if you are available for a few minutes
utter_ask_medicine: we got to know you were affected with Covid recently. Can you please confirm if you are still taking medicines
utter_ask_medicine_names: please let me know the medicine names
utter_ask_timing: do you want take the medicine in the morning afternoon or in the night
utter_will_notify: Thanks for your input. we will notify you for your medicine. Have a good day
utter_healthy: we are glad to know about your good health. Thanks for your time. Have a good day
initial_message: Please let me know if you are available for a few minutes
